purpose: Facilitate and automate complex research tasks that require extended processing times.
principle: Built using Python, leveraging asynchronous processing and advanced data handling techniques to manage long-running research tasks.
reusability: Offers modular components and APIs for easy integration into existing research workflows, supports customization for specific research needs.
limitations: Primarily focused on research tasks, may not be suitable for real-time applications or tasks requiring immediate responses.
name: jar3d_meta_expert
description: Versatile agents for long running, research intensive tasks.
highlight: Highly adaptable for intensive research tasks, designed to handle long-running operations efficiently.
